name: FireFlow
description:
Your job is simple, delve deep, retrieve the ancient treasures. Sounds easy enough right? oh i forgot to mention the lava which will melt you in seconds, and the short amount of time you have before the forge consumes you. This place is cursed, it's history unknown, unfortunately for you, it's unknown for a reason. Your a shadow of your former self, consumed by curiosity all to find the secret treasures which dwell deep of the 7th Earths forges.

When trying to quit the game press Escape.

https://forms.gle/Eyu3uYfHPTv2gVnEA
